src.helper_functions.plotting module¶

src.helper_functions.plotting.plot_cont_img1_col_img2(axes, image_data_1, image_data_2, region, threshold=[30, 40], title=None)¶
Parameters:
  • axes –
  • image_data_1 – image data used for contour
  • image_data_2 – image data used for color plot
  • region –
  • threshold –
  • title –
src.helper_functions.plotting.plot_esr_data_and_pos(img_data_reflect, img_data_fluor, region, esr_freq, esr_data, pt, size=0.02)¶
Parameters:
  • img_data_reflect – fluoresence image data to be plotted
  • img_data_fluor – reflection image data to be plotted
  • region – dictionary specifying extent of image
  • pt – point to be plotted on top of images to show the laser position
  • size – size of dot
Returns:

figure
src.helper_functions.plotting.plot_esr_plot(axes, esr_freq, esr_data, title='Image')¶
Parameters:
  • axes – axes object where to plot
  • esr_freq – 1d array with frequenies
  • esr_data – 1d array with esr data
  • title – plot title
src.helper_functions.plotting.plot_scan_image(axes, image_data, region, title=None)¶
Parameters:
  • axes – axes object where to plot
  • image_data – image data to be plotted
  • region – dictionary specifying extent of image
  • title – plot title
Returns:
